data: Marcus Lee is the CEO & Co-Founder of CloudVoyager.
Marcus Lee has 8 years of experience in startup leadership within the Cloud Infrastructure industry.
Marcus Lee founded CloudVoyager in 2019 with a vision to simplify cloud orchestration.
Marcus Lee has grown CloudVoyager from a two-person team to over 50 employees in five years.
Marcus Lee has negotiated partnerships with major cloud providers and secured Series A and B funding rounds totaling $30 million.
Marcus Lee is located in Austin, TX, US.
Marcus Lee spoke at TechCrunch Disrupt 2023 and has ongoing funding discussions according to research notes sourced from Crunchbase and Twitter DM.
Marcus Lee holds a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Texas at Austin.
